0.user_question: Scottish independence: political aim for Scotland to be independent from the UK. Is Alistair Darling in favor of Scottish independence?

ost_step.1: Alistair Darling is a British politician who has held several high-profile positions, including Chancellor of the Exchequer from 2007-2010 and Chairman of the Better Together campaign during the 2014 Scottish independence referendum.
ost_step.2: The Better Together campaign aimed to persuade voters that Scotland should remain part of the United Kingdom, arguing that independence would pose economic risks and reduce Scotland's influence within the UK.
ost_step.3: As chairman of this campaign, Alistair Darling was clearly in favor of Scotland remaining part of the UK, opposing Scottish independence.
ost_step.4: There is no indication that he has changed his stance since then, although specific views may evolve over time, his past role in opposition to independence remains clear.
